name: Raymond J. SMOLSKY, Appellant v. The DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee

parties: Raymond J. SMOLSKY, Appellant v. The DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of April, 2014, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Julie Renee Tilghman, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, for Department of Corrections.
casebody.head_matter:
91 A.3d 101
Raymond J. SMOLSKY, Appellant v. The DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 28, 2014.
Raymond J. Smolsky, pro se.
Julie Renee Tilghman, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, for Department of Corrections.
